data.strFullDescription:
新的生命之地。狩猎, 就是本能! 在系列最新作品「Monster Hunter: World」里, 地形和环境生物, 甚至魔物的生态系统都能被利用, 用一切手段挑战巨大的魔物。在新建构的「Monster Hunter: World」中, 可以体验到你一直期盼的极致猎人生活。 

[h2][b]介绍[/b][/h2]
[h2][b]概要[/b][/h2]
[b]在壮丽的大自然中与魔物进行一场史诗式的决斗。[/b]

玩家化身成猎人, 接受任务狩猎生活栖息在各种环境中的魔物。利用狩猎魔物取得的材料, 制作更强的武器和防具, 挑战更强大的魔物。

在系列最新作品「Monster Hunter: World」中,玩家可以体验终极的狩猎生活,活用新建构的世界中各种各样的地形与生态环境享受狩猎的惊喜与兴奋。
[img]https://media.st.dl.bscstorage.net/steam/apps/582010/extras/MHW_introduction.jpg?t=1575591846[/img]

[b]故事[/b]
每十年一度，古龙们都会渡海迈向遥远彼方的新大陆。

为了解释这个被称为「古龙渡」的奇妙现象，公会组织「新大陆古龙调查团」，多次派调查团前往新大陆。

今次已是第五次派遣，为了追踪渡海的古龙熔山龙，一名猎人乘进了这巨大的船中⋯⋯
[img]https://media.st.dl.bscstorage.net/steam/apps/582010/extras/MHW_story.jpg?t=1575591846[/img]

[h2][b]ا生态系统[/b][/h2]
[b]充满活力的新世界[/b]
充满多样化生命群体的广阔领域。各种各样的发现等着你去探索。

[h2][b]狩猎[/b][/h2]
[b]多彩的武器和装备，还有可靠的拍挡。[/b]
你的装备赋予你力量去开发这个未知的新世界。

[b]各种武器种类[/b]
共有14种武器可供选择使用，每款均有它各自的特色与用途。
选用多款武器，还是把一款武器用至极致，则取决於猎人的喜好。
[img]https://media.st.dl.bscstorage.net/steam/apps/582010/extras/MHW_hunters.jpg?t=1575591846[/img]

[b]导虫[/b]
魔物的足印和爪痕等踪迹遍布在四周，你的导虫会记得魔物的气味并带领你寻找它们。
当你搜集得愈多踪迹，导虫便能为你带来更多资讯。
[img]https://media.st.dl.bscstorage.net/steam/apps/582010/extras/MHW_shirubemushi_s.jpg?t=1575591846[/img]

[b]投射器[/b]
是可以作为武器使用的猎人新装备。
射中发光的楔虫就可以钩住它来移动。
[img]https://media.st.dl.bscstorage.net/steam/apps/582010/extras/MHW_slinger_s.jpg?t=1575591846[/img]

[b]特殊装备[/b]
使用後会在一定时间内发动特殊技能的装具，每种装具的效果都不同，使用方法与道具相同。
[img]https://media.st.dl.bscstorage.net/steam/apps/582010/extras/MHW_specialTool_s.jpg?t=1575591846[/img]

[b]随行艾路[/b]
猎人狩猎时的拍挡，擅长攻击丶回复等支援工作，是个虽然细小却可靠的拍挡。
作为调查员的一员，与猎人一同乘船，来到这个新大陆。
[img]https://media.st.dl.bscstorage.net/steam/apps/582010/extras/MHW_otomo.jpg?t=1575591846[/img]
data.strSnippet: 新的生命之地。狩猎, 就是本能! 在系列最新作品「Monster Hunter: World」中,玩家可以体验终极的狩猎生活,活用新建构的世界中各种各样的地形与生态环境享受狩猎的惊喜与兴奋。

vecHighlight.strDescription: 参加来自救难信号的任务，完成10次。
把任一随从道具的熟练度都提升到最大。

初次在狩猎纪录中纪录怪物所获得之最小冠。

vecUnachieved.strDescription: 初次完成”斗技大会任务“。

vecUnachieved.strName: 猎人生活停也停不下来！

vecUnachieved.strDescription: 获得5种非常贵重的防具。
累计收到10万点调查点数。
以多人游戏完成任务100次。

[["Achievement45",{"strName":"救援猎人","strDescription":"参加来自救难信号的任务，完成10次。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/2f1fcd19d9211583db1fd49d08cf23306b0f0133.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":32.29999923706055,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement46",{"strName":"和伙伴一起","strDescription":"以多人游戏完成任务。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/1f753f3edfc578c88d3c076f9f6fc4e0d272f4a9.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":74.9000015258789,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement3",{"strName":"据点的守护者","strDescription":"可以挑战★4的任务了。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/10a7dd9995b8ffae25f90e4dddc014b03a09f2be.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":71.80000305175781,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement5",{"strName":"安祥地沉眠","strDescription":"成功诱导熔山龙。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/02f71cfd5e52044720f5e8794ad6c9928c48e79a.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":60,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement34",{"strName":"迷你皇冠收藏家","strDescription":"在狩猎纪录中纪录10头以上的怪物所获得之最小冠。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/b2700338529c769f66f28943054a0067f1e512eb.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":11,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement14",{"strName":"新大陆的开拓者","strDescription":"已设置5处营地。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/92b18a8ec402a2490f118e9a88f13cafff7f7ed4.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":56.20000076293945,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement29",{"strName":"可靠的伙伴","strDescription":"把任一随从道具的熟练度都提升到最大。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/04d9de70fced3adf68ed1c20c7b6404a232888f6.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":59.400001525878906,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement0",{"strName":"新大陆的霸者","strDescription":"已解除所有「Monster Hunter：World」实绩","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/c28921e56775afc7d4de5a2fa811736aaa0f43e0.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":0.8999999761581421,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement38",{"strName":"巨型皇冠大师","strDescription":"在狩猎纪录中纪录几乎所有的怪物所获得之金冠。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/35ce1223896d88d7630d2905f52a7078628eed77.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":1.5,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement35",{"strName":"迷你皇冠大师","strDescription":"在狩猎纪录中纪录几乎所有的怪物所获得之最小冠。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/5c7899666994872fc7fb8e14cbb362570576655a.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":1.5,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement4",{"strName":"迈向更深处","strDescription":"可以挑战★5的任务了。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/808120f8494bc41c0af898a39b4bb3b6abab5cce.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":64.30000305175781,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement1",{"strName":"掀开猎人生活的序幕","strDescription":"可以挑战★2的任务了。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/a1e07a657b94c6355b50c10b64906cc32d573857.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":89.4000015258789,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement15",{"strName":"利用环境是猎人的基本修养","strDescription":"躲在草丛里逃离贼龙。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/e572edbfba03fb97c5dc2f2e280c31ec152aeecb.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":97.5,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement36",{"strName":"巨型皇冠","strDescription":"初次在狩猎纪录中纪录怪物所获得之银冠。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/e2907e12be9e6e924e855f2db8c1c00b0ef215a1.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":67.4000015258789,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement33",{"strName":"迷你皇冠","strDescription":"初次在狩猎纪录中纪录怪物所获得之最小冠。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/e4c73c7e29668074e719b8ba8b51a87071e8352b.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":46.29999923706055,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement10",{"strName":"探究之心","strDescription":"初次完成”调查任务“。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/23f855de051d3ae04c9fd22c9b27914ff6ba9dc1.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":64.19999694824219,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement39",{"strName":"第一次的活捉","strDescription":"初次捕获怪物。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/caa59189c12c52030f0d14b90c0a2623dc9ecbec.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":68.0999984741211,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement28",{"strName":"第一次的随从们","strDescription":"初次拥有随从们。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/1a434db6ef66cffd5ae424adb89f123dff4d78e6.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":74.5,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement18",{"strName":"倒下的巨型身躯","strDescription":"初次骑乘成功。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/5b3b9995d7f819c99596f8869db19c8d12c0b1e7.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":75,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement2",{"strName":"调查的进展","strDescription":"可以挑战★3的任务了。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/170256de23e0e0be24ac69f5510f74a887b036cc.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":80.5999984741211,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement30",{"strName":"怪物博士","strDescription":"几乎把所有大型怪物的研究等级都提升到最大。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/da00d5002d661d37feda60dc1a338212a45f2d5a.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":4.5,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement44",{"strName":"救命！","strDescription":"初次击出救难信号。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/59005a50f06b8aca450f1567053ffff1192ebd63.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":61.900001525878906,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement48",{"strName":"扩展的羁绊","strDescription":"收集公会名片达50张。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/108a304cd5b36c3dc1da81e94e4c2be456f57832.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":3.5,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement13",{"strName":"挑战巅峰","strDescription":"完成”斗技大会任务“50次。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/9266951e2eaa624189dc42af3b3232afd0ac480b.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2.4000000953674316,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement19",{"strName":"遇到活化石","strDescription":"钓起被称作活化石的鱼。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/3e17e45825e7f033698d493b99375ca9057ac8de.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":8.899999618530273,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement37",{"strName":"巨型皇冠收藏家","strDescription":"在狩猎纪录中纪录10头以上的怪物所获得之金冠。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/661f5bf8872138a78167a8aa44084c7d668489f0.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":10.800000190734863,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement43",{"strName":"怪物猎人","strDescription":"已狩猎500头大型怪物。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/57d92b4cd95b5c581a082055c7ec9c43bd693ce2.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":15.100000381469727,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement21",{"strName":"硬梆梆的触感","strDescription":"捕捉到触感硬梆梆的生物。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/b750d1a4f021bf3b1e9dd93818e96cead006d06a.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":4.900000095367432,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement20",{"strName":"轻飘飘的拥抱感","strDescription":"捕捉到拥抱感轻飘飘的生物。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/d977daf9bbe78126edad1d79ecb680c4275343d8.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":8.600000381469727,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement22",{"strName":"虹色光芒","strDescription":"捕捉到闪耀虹色光芒的生物。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/66c87222591b9eeac39c877b9074219f7c2f7b70.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":11.5,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement32",{"strName":"无所畏惧","strDescription":"已狩猎50头历战个体。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/1da29f2d7a705a2373da2f90b8951b5650dbd248.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":23.399999618530273,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement40",{"strName":"活捉的专家","strDescription":"已捕获50头怪物。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/81cd069f44da75443c23f65af7fdac4d3f84d6bc.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":32.5,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement11",{"strName":"调查团的中枢","strDescription":"完成”调查任务“50次。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/de8b396f3ed10fb980521aedefad59013d07932d.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":30.700000762939453,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement41",{"strName":"灭龙之人","strDescription":"已讨伐50头古龙。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/c6aed8d36ecfbe858e51ed21e73ef72f87dda187.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":26.100000381469727,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement27",{"strName":"新生活","strDescription":"搬迁至小屋。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/70c38c10ed97f5a51c3269ac1c4d322eb7e93726.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":52.70000076293945,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement47",{"strName":"永远和伙伴在一起","strDescription":"以多人游戏完成任务100次。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/4bf8679771de1418cb490fdf88783b3aa426576d.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":29.899999618530273,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement49",{"strName":"资深猎人","strDescription":"猎人等级达到100。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/fa430c2f5c33331a54a049c4a4e55d0cfb939b5e.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":17.299999237060547,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement26",{"strName":"力量就是一切","strDescription":"获得5种非常贵重的武器。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/1ca581c61c6c8e04a214df8c49735e52a0154e31.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":22.700000762939453,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement31",{"strName":"历战的怪物","strDescription":"初次狩猎历战个体。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/0c524255f8bd3c3af4b77b3ab7c6042e439957cd.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":43.400001525878906,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement8",{"strName":"指引明路的苍蓝星","strDescription":"解开古龙迁徙之谜了。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/1122a5179d2959b60b701493af25f7c67bf70253.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":46.20000076293945,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement25",{"strName":"铁壁猎人","strDescription":"获得5种非常贵重的防具。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/826cbd7a0f9494fe0941b62a1da348750b6576d6.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":40.29999923706055,"bHidden":false}],["Achievement7",{"strName":"激斗的胜利者","strDescription":"可以挑战★8的任务了。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/73f84995b2ad08c0d2ad49302631768fe5190736.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":51.79999923706055,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement6",{"strName":"大地的恩惠与美丽的女王","strDescription":"可以挑战★7的任务了。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/582010/91828efa7e920b5c74ecf952803b3c78516300de.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":54.5,"bHidden":true}]]

data.item_description:
The pack leader of the Jagras, the Great Jagras is known to go out of control when hungry.
It balloons to unbelievable proportions after swallowing prey.

An odd bird wyvern that has developed limbs capable of carrying weapons.
It's been spotted stealing eggs from nests found in the Ancient Forest and Wildspire Waste.

A large piscine wyvern that inhabits the swamps of the Wildspire Waste.
It uses mud to capture prey, and it's known to battle other monsters over territory.

A fanged wyvern that flies among the trees of the Ancient Forest.
Its penchant to brush against the ground and the trees
as it moves around builds up static electricity within its fur.

The Anjanath patrols the Ancient Forest looking for its favorite meal, Aptonoth.
This belligerent monster will attack anything without the slightest provocation.

The apex monster of the Coral Highlands, whose diet primarily consists of Raphinos.
It emits a chilling wind from its body, which dulls its prey's ability to escape.

A gigantic brute wyvern that eats the bones of carcasses found in the Rotten Vale, using some of it as armor.
It also rolls into a ball as a form of attack and transportation.

The apex monster of the Ancient Forest.
A terrible wyvern that descends upon invaders, attacking with poisonous claws and fiery breath.

A terrible elder dragon that appears when
other elders are in the vicinity. Its penchant
for destruction is well-documented.

An elder dragon that shields itself with fierce winds, preventing anyone from approaching it.
Its skin consists of hard, metallic scales.

A vast forest that supports a complex ecosystem.
A network of trees stretch high into the sky, creating the ancient tree that looms tall over the rest of the forest.

A massive strip of parched land conjoined with a swampland that takes in water from the Ancient Forest.
Ant colonies have built massive spires within the desert, while varied vegetation has sprung up along many watering holes.

This locale is now home to creatures that take advantage of the two unique, coexisting ecosystems.

A mysterious ecological highland that mimics the ebb and flow of the ocean itself.
Eggs from the corals ride upon the rising currents and spread to the rest of the New World,
where they become a part of the natural food chain.

A deep valley that rests beneath the Coral Highlands.
Monster corpses fall to the Vale from above, creating a layer of
decomposing remains that seems to serve an important ecological role.
Also unique to the Vale is the bacteria known as the effluvium, which devours organic matter.

An unexplored region overflowing with abundant energy.
With giant, mysterious crystals as its center, this harsh land is made up of lava flows and hardened basalt.
A number of powerful monsters make this land their home. It is also said to be a gathering place for Elder Dragons.
